title: Changing DataContext modifies previously bound view model
body: Using the fall creator's update version of UWP, it seems that when a data context is changed to a new view model, the previous view model is updated with null values. This is the same as if the DataContext is set to null before changing view models. It doesn't make sense why the bound values are updated when the DataContext is changed.
